subject: Benefits update
log_text: Internal email from HR to employee1 about benefits update, no links to external sites.

subject: Invoice for last month
log_text: Email from known vendor with standard PDF invoice attached.

subject: URGENT: Wire transfer request
log_text: Email claims to be from CEO asking for urgent wire transfer to new account, sender domain slightly different from real company domain.

subject: Reset your MFA immediately
log_text: Email urges user to reset MFA via external link that points to mismatched domain.

subject: Security awareness reminder
log_text: Legitimate internal security awareness reminder with internal links only.

subject: Overdue invoice
log_text: Email with vague subject and malicious attachment named invoice.exe.

subject: New login from unknown device
log_text: Legitimate alert from cloud provider about login from new device with correct branding and links.

subject: Payment failed - update card
log_text: Email asks user to update payment card details on fake payment portal with non-matching URL.

subject: EDR daily summary
log_text: Legitimate EDR daily summary email with standard contents.

subject: Confidential board doc
log_text: External email to CEO with link to download 'confidential board document' from file-sharing site that is rarely used.
